item.description: Welcome! I’m George. I am a project manager, and I love good designs that are simple while solving complicated problems. I am always exploring how the evolution of technology can cause better, simpler solutions to come about that wouldn’t have been possible before. the winding road are my explorations and learnings. A brief 411. I been a project manager in a wide varity of industries, from aerospace to health insurance to retail.
